ns0:entry.ns0:title: GoogleCloudPlatform/cloud-foundation-fabric
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/cloud-foundation-fabric
Language: hcl
End-to-end modular samples and landing zones toolkit for Terraform on GCP.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: bridgecrewio/checkov-action
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/bridgecrewio/checkov-action
Language: hcl
This GitHub Action runs Checkov against infrastructure-as-code, open source packages, container images, and CI/CD configurations to identify misconfigurations, vulnerabilities, and license compliance issues.

ns0:entry.ns0:content:

Language: hcl
A repository containing a collection of "glue" modules for encapsulating common Cloud Run patterns.

ns0:entry.ns0:content:

ns0:entry.ns0:title: cloudposse/terraform-datadog-platform
ns0:entry.ns0:content:
URL: https://github.com/cloudposse/terraform-datadog-platform
Language: hcl
